title: Testing For Covid-19
content:
Antigen tests* are rapid tests that usually produce results in 15-30 minutes. Positive results are accurate and reliable. However, in general, antigen tests are less likely to detect the virus than NAAT tests, especially when
symptoms
are not present. Therefore, a single negative antigen test cannot rule out infection.
To be confident you do not have COVID-19,
FDA recommends
